name: regex_automata::util::search::{impl#3}::offset
doc:
/// Returns a new span with `offset` added to this span's `start` and `end`
/// values.
code: pub fn offset(&self, offset: usize) -> Span {
Span { start: self.start + offset, end: self.end + offset }

cond_chains.ret: Span { start: self.start + offset, end: self.end + offset }
